olMib.name: olMib

revisions.description: MIB Updates for BTI 7000 Rel 10.1.0: - deleted un-implemented table olDegreeTable - added new traps for Connection Mismatch feature: olPortCondNotification.0.17 - olPortCondNotification.0.20 - added new WCH traps for refined add-channel power monitoring: wchCondNotifications.0.13 - wchCondNotifications.0.18
MIB Updates for BTI 7000 Rel 9.2.0: - added new object olPortRemoteId
Initial version of the Optical Layer MIB.

olMib.contactinfo: Technical Support BTI Systems Inc. 50 Northside Road Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K2H 5Z6 (613) 248-9154 support@btisystems.com
olMib.description: The external MIB definitions for the managenent of the BTI Dynamic Optical Layer components including DLA-series amplifiers and ROB-series ROADM modules.

OlGroupType.name: OlGroupType
OlGroupType.description: Identifies the configuration type of an optical layer grouping.

OlPortType.name: OlPortType
OlPortType.description: Identifies the type of managed optical interface port on an optical layer module.

olGroupTable.name: olGroupTable
olGroupTable.description: This table lists all provisioned optical layer module groupings on the node.

olGroupEntry.name: olGroupEntry
olGroupEntry.description: The conceptual row object of the optical layer group table.

olGroupIdx.name: olGroupIdx
olGroupIdx.description: A number which uniquely identifies the optical layer group within the node.

olGroupType.name: olGroupType
olGroupType.description: The optical layer group configuration type. This is a mandatory object that must be specified when a row of the table is created. The value of none is not applicable for this object.

olGroupId.name: olGroupId
olGroupId.description: Textual data recorded by the user to briefly identify the provisioned optical layer group in a manner useful to the user.

olGroupCustom1.name: olGroupCustom1
olGroupCustom1.description: A variable length text string for operating company use.

olGroupCustom2.name: olGroupCustom2
olGroupCustom2.description: A variable length text string for operating company use.

olGroupCustom3.name: olGroupCustom3
olGroupCustom3.description: A variable length text string for operating company use.

olGroupRowStatus.name: olGroupRowStatus
olGroupRowStatus.description: Used to control the addition and deletion of entries in the optical layer group table.

olEqptTable.name: olEqptTable
olEqptTable.description: This table lists all provisioned equipment modules that are assigned to an optical layer grouping.

olEqptEntry.name: olEqptEntry
olEqptEntry.description: The conceptual row object of the optical layer equipment table.

olEqptCpTypeIdx.name: olEqptCpTypeIdx
olEqptCpTypeIdx.description: The type of circuit pack of the equipment module that is assigned to the optical layer group.

olEqptShelfIdx.name: olEqptShelfIdx
olEqptShelfIdx.description: The number of the shelf of the equipment module that is assigned to the optical layer group. For equipment modules that do not reside in a shelf (40-channel Mux/Demux), the value of this object is 0.

olEqptSlotIdx.name: olEqptSlotIdx
olEqptSlotIdx.description: The number of the slot of the equipment module that is assigned to the optical layer group. For equipment modules that do not reside in an active shelf slot (ex. 40-channel Mux/Demux), this object represents the module index among modules attributed to shelf 0.

olEqptGroupNum.name: olEqptGroupNum
olEqptGroupNum.description: The optical layer group to which the equipment modules is assigned.

olEqptDegreeNum.name: olEqptDegreeNum
olEqptDegreeNum.description: The optical layer group degree to which the equipment module is assigned.

olEqptRowStatus.name: olEqptRowStatus
olEqptRowStatus.description: Used to control the addition and deletion of entries in the optical layer equipment table, which in turn, controls the assigning and unassigning of equipment modules to/from an optical layer grouping.

olPortTable.name: olPortTable
olPortTable.description: This table lists all managed ports on equipment modules assigned to optical layer groupings.

olPortEntry.name: olPortEntry
olPortEntry.description: The conceptual row object of the optical layer port table.

olPortCpTypeIdx.name: olPortCpTypeIdx
olPortCpTypeIdx.description: The type of circuit pack on which the optical layer port is located.

olPortShelfIdx.name: olPortShelfIdx
olPortShelfIdx.description: The number of the shelf on which the optical layer port is located.

olPortSlotIdx.name: olPortSlotIdx
olPortSlotIdx.description: The number of the slot on which the optical layer port is located.

olPortTypeIdx.name: olPortTypeIdx
olPortTypeIdx.description: The type of optical layer port according to the function it provides.

olPortIdx.name: olPortIdx
olPortIdx.description: The number of the optical layer port of the specified port type.

olPortId.name: olPortId
olPortId.description: Textual data recorded by the user to briefly identify the provisioned optical layer port in a manner useful to the user.

olPortCustom1.name: olPortCustom1
olPortCustom1.description: A variable length text string for operating company use.

olPortCustom2.name: olPortCustom2
olPortCustom2.description: A variable length text string for operating company use.

olPortCustom3.name: olPortCustom3
olPortCustom3.description: A variable length text string for operating company use.

olPortDWDMType.name: olPortDWDMType
olPortDWDMType.description: Used to configure the port for the type of DWDM composite to which it is inter-connection. By default, all ports are inter-connected with native optical layer DWDM composites. For some configurations, client port 2 of ROB2 pack and ROB4 modules may be configured for alien DWDM type.

olPortGrid.name: olPortGrid
olPortGrid.description: The DWDM grid spacing on the port.

olPortWavelength.name: olPortWavelength
olPortWavelength.description: The wavelength of the channel carried by the port. This object exists only in table entries for channel ports on Mux/Demux modules.

olPortFrequency.name: olPortFrequency
olPortFrequency.description: The frequency of the channel carried by the port. This object exists only in table entries for channel ports on Mux/Demux modules.

olPortOperStatus.name: olPortOperStatus
olPortOperStatus.description: The reported operational status of the optical layer port.

olPortOperStatQlfr.name: olPortOperStatQlfr
olPortOperStatQlfr.description: This is a textual list of qualifiers about the reported operational status of the optical layer port.

olPortRemoteId.name: olPortRemoteId
olPortRemoteId.description: Identifies the remote node and port to which the optical layer port is connected, in the format prescribed by the PSM network management system.

olPortExpCnxDegree.name: olPortExpCnxDegree
olPortExpCnxDegree.description: The expected degree number of the equipment that is inter-connected on the port.

olPortActCnxDegree.name: olPortActCnxDegree
olPortActCnxDegree.description: The actual degree number of the equipment that is inter-connected on the port.

olPortRowStatus.name: olPortRowStatus
olPortRowStatus.description: Used to control the addition and deletion of entries in the Optical Layer Port table. Manual creation and deletion is supported only for the client 2 port on ROB packs assigned to a Channel-equalizing Terminal or Reconfigurable Add/Drop node group.

eqptConnTable.name: eqptConnTable
eqptConnTable.description: This table lists all intra-group optical fiber patch connections between ports on equipment modules assigned to optical layer groupings.

eqptConnEntry.name: eqptConnEntry
eqptConnEntry.description: The conceptual row object of the equipment connection table.

eqptConnSrcCpTypeIdx.name: eqptConnSrcCpTypeIdx
eqptConnSrcCpTypeIdx.description: The type of circuit pack on which the source port of the equipment connection is located.

eqptConnSrcShelfIdx.name: eqptConnSrcShelfIdx
eqptConnSrcShelfIdx.description: The number of the shelf on which the source port of the equipment connection is located.

eqptConnSrcSlotIdx.name: eqptConnSrcSlotIdx
eqptConnSrcSlotIdx.description: The number of the slot on which the source port of the equipment connection is located.

eqptConnSrcPortTypeIdx.name: eqptConnSrcPortTypeIdx
eqptConnSrcPortTypeIdx.description: The type of the source port of the equipment connection, according to the function it provides.

eqptConnSrcIdx.name: eqptConnSrcIdx
eqptConnSrcIdx.description: The number of the port of the specified port type of the source port of the equipment connection.

eqptConnDstCpTypeIdx.name: eqptConnDstCpTypeIdx
eqptConnDstCpTypeIdx.description: The type of circuit pack on which the destination port of the equipment connection is located.

eqptConnDstShelfIdx.name: eqptConnDstShelfIdx
eqptConnDstShelfIdx.description: The number of the shelf on which the destination port of the equipment connection is located.

eqptConnDstSlotIdx.name: eqptConnDstSlotIdx
eqptConnDstSlotIdx.description: The number of the slot on which the destination port of the equipment connection is located.

eqptConnDstPortTypeIdx.name: eqptConnDstPortTypeIdx
eqptConnDstPortTypeIdx.description: The type of the destination port of the equipment connection, according to the function it provides.

eqptConnDstIdx.name: eqptConnDstIdx
eqptConnDstIdx.description: The number of the port of the specified port type of the destination port of the equipment connection.

eqptConnType.name: eqptConnType
eqptConnType.description: The type of optical fiber patch cable for the equipment connection entry.

eqptConnRowStatus.name: eqptConnRowStatus
eqptConnRowStatus.description: The equipment connection table RowStatus object is not readable or writeable because all entries in the table are automatically created and deleted as equipment modules are assigned and unassigned to optical layer groupings. This equipment connection row status object is used only in database change notifications to indicate if the row has been created or deleted.

olOSCTable.name: olOSCTable
olOSCTable.description: This table lists all OSC managed objects that have been created on the optical layer equipment modules.

olOSCEntry.name: olOSCEntry
olOSCEntry.description: The conceptual row object of the optical laye OSC table.

olOSCCpTypeIdx.name: olOSCCpTypeIdx
olOSCCpTypeIdx.description: The type of circuit pack on which the OSC is located.

olOSCShelfIdx.name: olOSCShelfIdx
olOSCShelfIdx.description: The number of the shelf in which the OSC is located.

olOSCSlotIdx.name: olOSCSlotIdx
olOSCSlotIdx.description: The number of the slot in which the OSC is located.

olOSCLineIdx.name: olOSCLineIdx
olOSCLineIdx.description: The line number of the OSC.

olOSCAdminStatus.name: olOSCAdminStatus
olOSCAdminStatus.description: The administrative status of the OSC. The default value is autoEnabled if the supporting equipment is enabled or autoEnabled, otherwise it is disabled.

olOSCOperStatus.name: olOSCOperStatus
olOSCOperStatus.description: The reported operational status of the OSC.

olOSCOperStatQlfr.name: olOSCOperStatQlfr
olOSCOperStatQlfr.description: This is a textual list of qualifiers about the reported operational status of the OSC.

olOSCAutoEnableTimer.name: olOSCAutoEnableTimer
olOSCAutoEnableTimer.description: Specifies the auto-enable timer for the targeted OSC. This value only applies if the olOSCAdminStatus object is set to autoEnabled, in which case the default value is 008-00, otherwise, it is 000-00.

olOSCActAutoEnableTimer.name: olOSCActAutoEnableTimer
olOSCActAutoEnableTimer.description: Indicates the time remaining on the auto-enable timer if it is actively counting down. Otherwise, the value returned is 000-00.

olOSCId.name: olOSCId
olOSCId.description: Textual data recorded by the user to briefly identify the OSC object in a manner useful to the user.

olOSCCustom1.name: olOSCCustom1
olOSCCustom1.description: A variable length text string for operating company use.

olOSCCustom2.name: olOSCCustom2
olOSCCustom2.description: A variable length text string for operating company use.

olOSCCustom3.name: olOSCCustom3
olOSCCustom3.description: A variable length text string for operating company use.

olOSCFEIMMon.name: olOSCFEIMMon
olOSCFEIMMon.description: This object is used to control the monitoring of the Far End Node Mismatch Identifier condition. When enabled, the received far-end node identification attributes will be monitored and compared to the expected far-end node identification attribites, and a condition is raised if attributes do no match.

olOSCExpFESysName.name: olOSCExpFESysName
olOSCExpFESysName.description: The expected far-end node system identifier.

olOSCExpFEIPAddr.name: olOSCExpFEIPAddr
olOSCExpFEIPAddr.description: The expected far-end node IP address.

olOSCExpFEGrp.name: olOSCExpFEGrp
olOSCExpFEGrp.description: The expected far-end node optical layer group number.

olOSCExpFEDegr.name: olOSCExpFEDegr
olOSCExpFEDegr.description: The expected far-end node optical layer degree number.

olOSCFESysName.name: olOSCFESysName
olOSCFESysName.description: The actual far-end node system identifier.

olOSCFEIPAddr.name: olOSCFEIPAddr
olOSCFEIPAddr.description: The actual far-end node IP address.

olOSCFEGrp.name: olOSCFEGrp
olOSCFEGrp.description: The actual far-end node optical layer group number.

olOSCFEDegr.name: olOSCFEDegr
olOSCFEDegr.description: The actual far-end node optical layer degree number.

olOSCFEGrpType.name: olOSCFEGrpType
olOSCFEGrpType.description: The actual far-end node optical layer group configuration type.

olOSCRowStatus.name: olOSCRowStatus
olOSCRowStatus.description: The Optical Layer OSC table RowStatus object is not readable or writeable because all entries in the table are automatically created and deleted when the supporting DLA or ROB equipment is provisioned. This optical layer OSC row status object is used only in database change notifications to indicate if the row has been created or deleted.

odccTable.name: odccTable
odccTable.description: This table lists all provisioned ODCC objects on equipment modules assigned to optical layer groupings.

odccEntry.name: odccEntry
odccEntry.description: The conceptual row object of the ODCC table.

odccCpTypeIdx.name: odccCpTypeIdx
odccCpTypeIdx.description: The type of circuit pack on which the ODCC is located.

odccShelfIdx.name: odccShelfIdx
odccShelfIdx.description: The number of the shelf in which the ODCC is located.

odccSlotIdx.name: odccSlotIdx
odccSlotIdx.description: The number of the slot in which the ODC is located.

odccLineIdx.name: odccLineIdx
odccLineIdx.description: The line number of the ODCC.

odccAdminStatus.name: odccAdminStatus
odccAdminStatus.description: The administrative status of the ODCC. The default value is disabled if the supporting ODC is disabled, otherwise it is enabled.

odccRowStatus.name: odccRowStatus
odccRowStatus.description: Used to control the addition and deletion of entries in the ODCC table, which in turn controls the provisioning and de-provisioning of ODCC objects.

wdmTable.name: wdmTable
wdmTable.description: This table lists all WDM managed objects that have been created on optical layer equipment.

wdmEntry.name: wdmEntry
wdmEntry.description: The conceptual row object of the WDM table.

wdmCpTypeIdx.name: wdmCpTypeIdx
wdmCpTypeIdx.description: The type of circuit pack on which the WDM is located.

wdmShelfIdx.name: wdmShelfIdx
wdmShelfIdx.description: The number of the shelf in which the WDM is located.

wdmSlotIdx.name: wdmSlotIdx
wdmSlotIdx.description: The number of the slot in which the WDM is located.

wdmLineIdx.name: wdmLineIdx
wdmLineIdx.description: The line number of the WDM.

wdmAdminStatus.name: wdmAdminStatus
wdmAdminStatus.description: The administrative status of the WDM. The default value is autoEnabled if the supporting equipment is enabled or autoEnabled, otherwise it is disabled.

wdmOperStatus.name: wdmOperStatus
wdmOperStatus.description: The reported operational status of the WDM.

wdmOperStatQlfr.name: wdmOperStatQlfr
wdmOperStatQlfr.description: This is a textual list of qualifiers about the reported operational status of the WDM.

wdmAutoEnableTimer.name: wdmAutoEnableTimer
wdmAutoEnableTimer.description: Specifies the auto-enable timer for the targeted WDM. This value only applies if the wdmAdminStatus object is set to autoEnabled, in which case the default value is 008-00, otherwise, it is 000-00.

wdmActAutoEnableTimer.name: wdmActAutoEnableTimer
wdmActAutoEnableTimer.description: Indicates the time remaining on the auto-enable timer if it is actively counting down. Otherwise, the value returned is 000-00.

wdmId.name: wdmId
wdmId.description: Textual data recorded by the user to briefly identify the WDM object in a manner useful to the user.

wdmCustom1.name: wdmCustom1
wdmCustom1.description: A variable length text string for operating company use.

wdmCustom2.name: wdmCustom2
wdmCustom2.description: A variable length text string for operating company use.

wdmCustom3.name: wdmCustom3
wdmCustom3.description: A variable length text string for operating company use.

wdmFiberType.name: wdmFiberType
wdmFiberType.description: The fiber type of the span fiber.

wdmSpanLength.name: wdmSpanLength
wdmSpanLength.description: The measured length of the receive span fiber.

wdmSpanLossRxHighTh.name: wdmSpanLossRxHighTh
wdmSpanLossRxHighTh.description: The high threshold setting for the loss on the receive fiber of the Line span. The setting for this object is used to evaluate the olPortLossRxHighThCond trap. When the value of this object is set to 0, the olPortLossRxHighThCond trap is disabled.

wdmSpanLossSpecMax.name: wdmSpanLossSpecMax
wdmSpanLossSpecMax.description: The specified maximum supported loss on the Line span. The value of this object is dependent on the optical layer group configurations of the local and far-end nodes.

wdmNumChannels.name: wdmNumChannels
wdmNumChannels.description: The actual number of channels that the WDM is currently provisioned to carry.

wdmRowStatus.name: wdmRowStatus
wdmRowStatus.description: The WDM table RowStatus object is not readable or writeable because all entries in the table are automatically created and deleted when the supporting DLA or ROB circuit pack is assigned and unassigned to an optical layer grouping. This WDM row status object is used only in database change notifications to indicate if the row has been created or deleted.

wchXCTable.name: wchXCTable
wchXCTable.description: This table lists all configured wavelength channel cross-connections configured on optical layer equipment.

wchXCEntry.name: wchXCEntry
wchXCEntry.description: The conceptual row object of the wavelength channel cross-connection table.

wchXCSrcCpTypeIdx.name: wchXCSrcCpTypeIdx
wchXCSrcCpTypeIdx.description: The type of circuit pack on which the source wavelength channel of the cross-connection is located.

wchXCSrcShelfIdx.name: wchXCSrcShelfIdx
wchXCSrcShelfIdx.description: The number of the shelf on which the source wavelength channel of the cross-connection is located.

wchXCSrcSlotIdx.name: wchXCSrcSlotIdx
wchXCSrcSlotIdx.description: The number of the slot on which the source wavelength channel of the cross-connection is located.

wchXCSrcPortTypeIdx.name: wchXCSrcPortTypeIdx
wchXCSrcPortTypeIdx.description: The type of port on which the source wavelength channel of the cross-connection is located.

wchXCSrcPortIdx.name: wchXCSrcPortIdx
wchXCSrcPortIdx.description: The number of the port on which the source wavelength channel of the cross-connection is located.

wchXCSrcChannelIdx.name: wchXCSrcChannelIdx
wchXCSrcChannelIdx.description: The channel number of the source wavelength channel of the cross-connection.

wchXCDstCpTypeIdx.name: wchXCDstCpTypeIdx
wchXCDstCpTypeIdx.description: The type of circuit pack on which the destination wavelength channel of the cross-connection is located.

wchXCDstShelfIdx.name: wchXCDstShelfIdx
wchXCDstShelfIdx.description: The number of the shelf on which the destination wavelength channel of the cross-connection is located.

wchXCDstSlotIdx.name: wchXCDstSlotIdx
wchXCDstSlotIdx.description: The number of the slot on which the destination wavelength channel of the cross-connection is located.

wchXCDstPortTypeIdx.name: wchXCDstPortTypeIdx
wchXCDstPortTypeIdx.description: The type of port on which the destination wavelength channel of the cross-connection is located.

wchXCDstPortIdx.name: wchXCDstPortIdx
wchXCDstPortIdx.description: The number of the port on which the destination wavelength channel of the cross-connection is located.

wchXCDstChannelIdx.name: wchXCDstChannelIdx
wchXCDstChannelIdx.description: The channel number of the destination wavelength channel of the cross-connection.

wchXCServiceName.name: wchXCServiceName
wchXCServiceName.description: Name of end-to-end wavelength service of which this cross- connection is a part.

wchXCRowStatus.name: wchXCRowStatus
wchXCRowStatus.description: Used to control the addition and deletion of entries in the wavelength channel cross-connection table.

wchTable.name: wchTable
wchTable.description: This table lists all managed wavelength channels on equipment modules assigned to optical layer groupings.

wchEntry.name: wchEntry
wchEntry.description: The conceptual row object of the wavelength channel table.

wchCpTypeIdx.name: wchCpTypeIdx
wchCpTypeIdx.description: The type of circuit pack on which the wavelength channel is located.

wchShelfIdx.name: wchShelfIdx
wchShelfIdx.description: The number of the shelf on which the wavelength channel is located.

wchSlotIdx.name: wchSlotIdx
wchSlotIdx.description: The number of the slot on which the wavelength channel is located.

wchPortTypeIdx.name: wchPortTypeIdx
wchPortTypeIdx.description: The type of port on which the wavelength channel is located.

wchPortIdx.name: wchPortIdx
wchPortIdx.description: The number of the port on which the wavelength channel is located.

wchIdx.name: wchIdx
wchIdx.description: The number of the targeted wavelength channel.

wchAdminStatus.name: wchAdminStatus
wchAdminStatus.description: The administrative status of the wavelength channel. The default value is autoEnabled if the supporting WDM is enabled or autoEnabled, otherwise it is disabled.

wchOperStatus.name: wchOperStatus
wchOperStatus.description: The reported operational status of the wavelength channel.

wchOperStatQlfr.name: wchOperStatQlfr
wchOperStatQlfr.description: This is a textual list of qualifiers about the reported operational status of the wavelength channel.

wchAutoEnableTimer.name: wchAutoEnableTimer
wchAutoEnableTimer.description: Specifies the auto-enable timer for the targeted wavelength channel. This value only applies if the wchAdminStatus object is set to autoEnabled, in which case the default value is 008-00, otherwise, it is 000-00.

wchActAutoEnableTimer.name: wchActAutoEnableTimer
wchActAutoEnableTimer.description: Indicates the time remaining on the auto-enable timer if it is actively counting down. Otherwise, the value returned is 000-00.

wchId.name: wchId
wchId.description: Textual data recorded by the user to briefly identify the wavelength channel object in a manner useful to the user.

wchCustom1.name: wchCustom1
wchCustom1.description: A variable length text string for operating company use.

wchCustom2.name: wchCustom2
wchCustom2.description: A variable length text string for operating company use.

wchCustom3.name: wchCustom3
wchCustom3.description: A variable length text string for operating company use.

wchBitrate.name: wchBitrate
wchBitrate.description: The bitrate of the signal carried by the wavelength channel. A value of tenGig applies to all signal bitrates of 10Gb/sec or less.

wchGrid.name: wchGrid
wchGrid.description: The minimum grid spacing with which the channel is compatible.

wchRowStatus.name: wchRowStatus
wchRowStatus.description: The Wavelength Channel table RowStatus object is not readable or writeable because all entries in the Wavelength Channel table are automatically created and deleted when an wavelength channel cross-connection involving the wavelength channel is created or deleted. This Wavelength Channel row status object is used only in database change notifications to indicate if the row has been created or deleted.

olGroupMergeCmd.name: olGroupMergeCmd
olGroupMergeCmd.description: This object is used to invoke an optical layer group merge operation. The optical layer group merge is activated when this object is set to invoke(2). The values of the olGroupMergePrimary and olGroupMergeSecondary objects must be set in the same set request as this object. When a get is performed on this object, the value returned is idle(1).

olGroupMergePrimary.name: olGroupMergePrimary
olGroupMergePrimary.description: The identifier of the primary optical layer group of the merge.

olGroupMergeSecondary.name: olGroupMergeSecondary
olGroupMergeSecondary.description: The identifier of the secondary optical layer group of the merge.

olOSCCrntPMTable.name: olOSCCrntPMTable
olOSCCrntPMTable.description: A table of current performance monitoring statistics collected for the optical layer OSC objects on the NE.

olOSCCrntPMEntry.name: olOSCCrntPMEntry
olOSCCrntPMEntry.description: The row entry object of the optical layer OSC current performance monitoring table. Each row of this table contains a full set of PM statistics and related data for a current measurement interval for a given optical layer OSC object.

olOSCCrntPMCpTypeIdx.name: olOSCCrntPMCpTypeIdx
olOSCCrntPMCpTypeIdx.description: The type of circuit pack on which the optical layer OSC targeted for PMs is located.

olOSCCrntPMShelfIdx.name: olOSCCrntPMShelfIdx
olOSCCrntPMShelfIdx.description: The number of the shelf in which the optical layer OSC targeted for PMs is located.

olOSCCrntPMSlotIdx.name: olOSCCrntPMSlotIdx
olOSCCrntPMSlotIdx.description: The number of the slot in which the optical layer OSC targeted for PMs is located.

olOSCCrntPMLineIdx.name: olOSCCrntPMLineIdx
olOSCCrntPMLineIdx.description: The line number of the OSC targeted for PMs.

olOSCCrntPMIntervalTypeIdx.name: olOSCCrntPMIntervalTypeIdx
olOSCCrntPMIntervalTypeIdx.description: The type of PM bin according to interval length.

olOSCCrntPMOPRValue.name: olOSCCrntPMOPRValue
olOSCCrntPMOPRValue.description: The OSC optical power received on the Line port.

olOSCCrntPMOPRTimeStamp.name: olOSCCrntPMOPRTimeStamp
olOSCCrntPMOPRTimeStamp.description: The date and time stamp of the optical power received value.

olOSCCrntPMOPRValidity.name: olOSCCrntPMOPRValidity
olOSCCrntPMOPRValidity.description: Indicates the validity of the provided optical power received value.

olOSCCrntPMOPTValue.name: olOSCCrntPMOPTValue
olOSCCrntPMOPTValue.description: The OSC optical power transmitted at the output of the Line port.

olOSCCrntPMOPTTimeStamp.name: olOSCCrntPMOPTTimeStamp
olOSCCrntPMOPTTimeStamp.description: The date and time stamp of the optical power transmitted value.

olOSCCrntPMOPTValidity.name: olOSCCrntPMOPTValidity
olOSCCrntPMOPTValidity.description: Indicates the validity of the provided optical power transmitted value.

olOSCCrntPMOBRTimeStamp.name: olOSCCrntPMOBRTimeStamp
olOSCCrntPMOBRTimeStamp.description: The date and time stamp of the optical back-reflected power value.

olOSCCrntPMOBRValidity.name: olOSCCrntPMOBRValidity
olOSCCrntPMOBRValidity.description: Indicates the validity of the provided optical back-reflected power value.

olOSCCrntPMCVSValue.name: olOSCCrntPMCVSValue
olOSCCrntPMCVSValue.description: The count of coding violations at the section layer of the received OSC signal.

olOSCCrntPMCVSTimeStamp.name: olOSCCrntPMCVSTimeStamp
olOSCCrntPMCVSTimeStamp.description: The date and time stamp of the section layer coding violations value.

olOSCCrntPMCVSValidity.name: olOSCCrntPMCVSValidity
olOSCCrntPMCVSValidity.description: Indicates the validity of the provided section layer coding violations value.

olOSCCrntPMCVSInitialize.name: olOSCCrntPMCVSInitialize
olOSCCrntPMCVSInitialize.description: Used to initialize the value of the olOSCCrntPMCVSValue object to 0.

olOSCCrntPMESSValue.name: olOSCCrntPMESSValue
olOSCCrntPMESSValue.description: The count of errored seconds at the section layer of the received OSC signal.

olOSCCrntPMESSTimeStamp.name: olOSCCrntPMESSTimeStamp
olOSCCrntPMESSTimeStamp.description: The date and time stamp of the section layer errored seconds value.

olOSCCrntPMESSValidity.name: olOSCCrntPMESSValidity
olOSCCrntPMESSValidity.description: Indicates the validity of the provided section layer errored seconds value.

olOSCCrntPMESSInitialize.name: olOSCCrntPMESSInitialize
